reuters.title: JOHN LABATT LTD 3RD QTR SHR DILUTED 32 CTS VS 30 CTS
reuters.body:
Texas Air Corp said it named Norman McInnis as president of its Britt Airways unit, succeeding Bill Britt, who retired March one. McInnis, former president of Royale Airlines, most recently was a consultant to the commuter airline industry.
Reuter 
